content:
TITLE: Running Complete Nightly Builds
DESCRIPTION: Commands for running full nightly builds, monitoring build progress, and specifying additional build options. These builds generate comprehensive logs for analysis.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make nightly
# make watch[-<step>]
# make nightly EXTRABRANCH=master
# make print-LOGSDIR
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Reviewing and Updating Port Tree in OpenSense
DESCRIPTION: Commands for updating the ports tree from upstream while preserving local modifications. The skim functionality allows reviewing and selectively copying changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make skim[-<option>]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rebuilding OPNsense Core and Plugins
DESCRIPTION: Commands for rebuilding OPNsense core and plugins on package sets. Supports both non-destructive rebuilds for missing components and full rebuilds of specific packages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make hotfix[-<step>]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cleaning Build Steps in OpenSense
DESCRIPTION: Commands for cleaning individual build step progress and removing various built components from the build system. These options help maintain a clean build environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make clean-<option>[,...]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Accessing Build Jail for Inspection
DESCRIPTION: Command to enter the active build jail using chroot for debugging and inspection purposes. Allows direct access to the build environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make chroot[-<subdir>]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Managing Remote Distribution of Builds
DESCRIPTION: Commands for pushing and pulling sets, images, and logs to/from remote locations. Provides flexibility for distributing builds across different environments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make upload-<set>[,...]
# make download-<set>[,...]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Syncing Ports for Custom Package Builds
DESCRIPTION: Command for maintaining branches by cherry-picking updates from the master branch to another branch for specific ports. Simplifies the process of keeping branches up to date.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make sync-category/port[,category/port[,...]]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating make.conf for OPNsense
DESCRIPTION: Command to generate make.conf contents for building packages that are not published on the mirrors. Enables standalone use of the ports tree on the host system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make make.conf
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Managing Version Numbers for Build Components
DESCRIPTION: Commands for reading and modifying version numbers of build sets and images. Allows setting custom versions for build components rather than using automatic version detection.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make rename-<set>[,<another_set>] VERSION=<new_name>
# make info
# make fingerprint
# make print-<variable1>[,<variable2>]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Custom Images with Additional Plugins
DESCRIPTION: Command to create custom images with additional plugins from external locations. Allows integration of non-standard components into the build.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make custom-<image> ADDITIONS="an-existing-plugin path/to/extra/plugin"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rebasing File Lists for Base Sets
DESCRIPTION: Command to regenerate base package lists and obsoleted files when base files have changed. Ensures package manifests are up to date.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make rebase
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Compressing Images for Distribution
DESCRIPTION: Command to manually compress images using bzip2 for distribution. Prepares images for uploading and sharing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make compress-<image1>[,<image2>]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Booting Images in Bhyve Hypervisor
DESCRIPTION: Command to boot final images using the native bhyve hypervisor. Note that login is only possible via Nano and Serial images, and VM images work only for 'raw' types.
SOURCE: https://github.com/opnsense/tools/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# make boot-<image>
```
